text: Hello, How are you?
Hi doing great!
Have you ever heard of Save the Children?
Yes, I have. I believe a long while back I donated to Save the Children. A little girl I had sent money to and she drew pictures for me.
Oh that's awesome. Did she say that it made a big impact on her life?
Yes. She had books for school and a few things that she did not have. Her pictures showed her smiling and I do hope that it really helped her.

It seems like it is a really good organization. I just saw a really sad picture today of a kid in West Africa working as a mechanic. I wish everyone everywhere had good access to education and that children didn't have to work in other countries.

Yes I do too. I was really happy that I was able to do something for the little girl. Since we are talking about it, I wonder how she is now. I know she is an adult now. Hopefully she is having a decent life.
I hope so too. Hopefully, you helped her get there with your donations.
Yeah. There are so many people all over the world who are having a hard time in life. I will probably donate again in the near future.
Speaking of that, would you be willing to donate some or all of your proceeds from this conversation to Save the Children?
Sure. I will donate the $0.30 that I am promised after this survey.
Cool, that would be awesome. The researchers will collect the donations and send it to Save the Children.
Okay. That's great. I love to be apart of organizations like this. I stopped a long time ago because of finances. In the near future I will start donating again.
I hear you. There are a lot of things that I would like to contribute to, but don't have the extra money. I think we actually get a bonus of up to $2.00 for this task if I am understanding correctly.
Oh okay. That's great. Yeah. I didn't know this was for Save the Children, but I am glad that I can contribute a little bit to them. Every little bit counts, right?
Yeah, absolutely. Thanks for contributing to them. I didn't realize that they help children here in the United States too.
Oh really? I didn't know that either. I was just thinking about asking about that. I feel bad that we have children in our own country that are having a hard time.
Yes, I was just reading that they are helping still some of the kids affected by Hurricane Harvey.
Yes. That was a terrible disaster. It really destroyed a lot of people's lives. I can't believe that they are still trying to come up from it now.
I know. It was awful. Well it's been great talking to you. So you are going to donate $.30? Just confirming?
Yes I am. And it was great chatting with you as well. Have a wonderful rest of your weekend!
You too! Enjoy the long weekend.
Okay. Thanks. Bye.
